kashyapaya, yamse daksha kumbaalek ho kumbaalakhuge athawassek ho monawata piriyam kala (=sakas kala) matten yam yam bhajana wisheshayak kamaththe nam, ee ee daya ma karanne da, monawata nipadawanne da- kashyapaya yamse daksha danthakarayek (athdath aadiyen wisithuru kam karannek) ho danthakarayakuge athawassek ho monawata piriyam kala (=dos iwath kota monawata sakas kala)dathekhi yam yam danthawikruthiyath (dathehi kala wisithuru rupadiyak) kamathi wanne nam, ee ee daya ma karanne da, wesesin nipadawanne - kashyapaya, yamse ho daksha rankaruwek ho rankaruwekuge athawassek ho monawata sakas kala ranehi yam yama swarna wikruththiyak (aabharana aadiyak) kamaththe nam, ee ee daya ma karanne da , nipadawanne da, kashyapaya eparidden ma mahana theme mese samahitha wu sitha pirisidu wu kalhi, dipthimath wu kalhi keles rahitha wu kalhi, upakleshayan paha wa giya kalhi, mrudu wu kalhi, sruddhiwidhagnyanaya pinisa sitha meheyawayi nambauru kereyi.
namuth me thanathurata pathwu hama ekkenama (di bi wijethunga hara) manasika wikruthiyakata, olmada gathiyakata pathwena bawa pene.
